snippet: American technologies, including 3-D and large format films, are delivering content to Chinese moviegoers who are increasingly focused on authenticity and a high-quality experience that cannot be pirated.
abstract: American technologies, including 3-D and large format films, are delivering content to Chinese moviegoers who are increasingly focused on authenticity and a high-quality experience that cannot be pirated.
lead_paragraph: American technologies, including 3-D and large format films, are delivering content to Chinese moviegoers who are increasingly focused on authenticity and a high-quality experience that cannot be pirated.

headline.seo: U.S. Filmmakers Eager to Feed China’s Appetite for 3-D
headline.main: Hollywood Eager to Feed China’s Appetite for 3-D
headline.print_headline: Hollywood Eager to Feed China’s Appetite for 3-D
